CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 22, 1952, pg. 12, reads: "YWCA is Presented New Bible - Members of the World Fellowship Committee presented a copy of the newly translated and revised version of the Bible to the YWCA. Dr. C. A. Burrell, right, is pictured giving a copy of the new Bible to Mrs. Mildred Young, branch executive, in a special ceremony.  Others in picture, are left to right: Mrs. Grace McCray, Miss E. Marie Coleman, Mrs. Odessa Bussey, Mrs. Willa Mae Rice, Mrs. Charles Pernell, Dr. Burrell, Mrs. Alma A. Polk, Mrs. Sallie Morris, and Mrs. Rodney Pryor. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Dr. C. A. Burrell presenting bible to Mildred Young, with woman, possibly Mrs. Charles Pernell, and Willa Mae Rice standing in between them, in Centre Avenue branch of YWCA
